page.title: 18Llangeitho Social life
page.content: There are many social activities in Llangeitho. In the village hall, the following clubs meet every week: the Men's Institute, the Women's Rural Institute , and the Aelwyd (the Welsh language youth movement). There are social evenings with the church and chapel. The Ysgol Feithrin (the Welsh medium playschool group) meets occasionally in the Llangeitho School and the Merched y Wawyr (the Women of the Dawn) meets in the hall at Llwynpiod, a mile from Llangeitho. There is a Three Horse Shoes Darts Team organised through meetings in the village pub. There is much to do in Llangeitho, most of it carried out entirely using the welsh language. The village life of Llangeitho is closely knit and happy, just like a large family, everyone knows everyone and everyone helps everyone.
